changeSet.author: srb55
changeSet.comment: take the edit mode "travelEntry" from the FO Role

changeSet.author: srb55
changeSet.comment: Add PERM to favorite account role
changeSet.sql: insert into krim_role_perm_t (role_perm_id, obj_id, ver_nbr, role_id, perm_id, actv_ind) values (KRIM_ROLE_PERM_ID_S.nextval, sys_guid(), 1, (select role_id from krim_role_t where nmspc_cd='KFS-SYS' and role_nm = 'Favorite Account Manager'), (select perm_id from krim_perm_t where nmspc_cd = 'KFS-SYS' and nm = 'Maintain Favorite Account'), 'Y') /
